td.a: Schools Will Remain Closed Until At Least May 15th
td.br: Today, Governor Murphy announced that schools will remain closed until at least May 15th. On Monday, April 20th, the Point Pleasant School District will return to remote learning. If any further guidance is released by the Department of Education, the school community will be updated as soon as possible.
